mainEntity.name: The Collection Content Is Being Duplicated - what should I do?

acceptedAnswer.text: If you have installed Optizen and your collection content is showing twice, it's likely you had Version 1 installed previously. Follow the steps in the provided video tutorial to solve this problem.
Tag pages should be optimized to improve content organization and user experience
The Enterprise plan offers additional features including Variant Tagger and Variant Image Thumbnail Matcher

@graph.name: Collection Content Duplication
@graph.description: When collection content appears twice on collection pages, typically caused by having Version 1 previously installed
